text: @BrianKempGA #COVID19 surge in #Georgia & #metroAtlanta counties. @GwinnettGov has over 7,000 cases, @FultonInfo is over 6,000 while @ItsInDeKalb has crossed 5,000 & @cobbcountygovt now has over 4,000 confirmed cases. #HallCounty a recent #hotspot has over 3,000 cases. @GwinnettNewsNow @ajc
